info.brief_description: How will young James fare alone with his mature, womanly neighbors?
info.description:
Something makes James different. Maybe he was born small? Or is squishy? Or can transform? Or has any number of different conditions that make him different from everyone else. The other thing that sets him apart from everyone else is that older, attractive women in his neighborhood surround him in his neighborhood. Some are kind, some are not. He thinks he’s safe in his small, lower class neighborhood, but he’ll find he’s in more trouble then he ever imagined.

Anything goes for this story. Have fun, be creative and see what mischief James can get into as he tries to navigate through the mature women of his life.
